All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ButtonListener
ButtonListener handles actions performed on buttons in the user interface.
CityMap
Represents a city map with intersections, road segments, and delivery requests.
Command
Represents a command.
CommandAddDeliveryRequest
This class represents the command to add a delivery request to a tour.
CommandList
This class represents a list of commands that can be executed, undone, redone, and reset.
CommandRemoveDeliveryRequest
This class represents the command to remove a delivery request from a tour.
CompleteGraph
This class represents a complete directed graph with a cost matrix.
Controller
The Controller class manages the application's logic.
Courier
Represents a courier involved in a tour.
CourierDisplayTourListListener
 
DefaultState
This class provides default implementations for the State interface methods.
DeliveryRequest
Represents a delivery request, a special type of intersection.
Dijkstra
The `Dijkstra` class provides a static method for performing Dijkstra's algorithm on a graph represented by adjacency lists to find the shortest paths from a given source node to all other nodes.
Edge
Represents an edge in a graph with a target node and a distance.
ExceptionHTML
The ExceptionXML class represents an exception specific to HTML handling.
ExceptionXML
The ExceptionXML class represents an exception specific to XML handling.
GeneratedGraph
 
Graph
This class represents a graph data structure used for modeling road networks.
GraphicalView
GraphicalView provides a graphical representation of the map, delivery requests, and tours.
HTMLdeserializer
This class provides methods for deserializing a Tour into a road map HTML page.
Intersection
Represents an intersection in the city map.
IntersectionView
IntersectionView contains methods to draw an intersection on the map.
ListListener
ListListener is responsible for handling list selection events and notifying the controller.
ListPanel
ListPanel represents a panel for displaying a list of delivery requests and a list of couriers.
Main
This class contains the main method to start the application.
MapPanel
MapPanel represents a panel for displaying the city map with its road segments, intersections, and tour.
MouseListeners
MouseListeners is a class that implements various mouse-related event listeners.
Pair<F,S>
The `Pair` class represents a simple generic pair of two values, typically used to store two related values together.
RoadSegment
Represents a road segment connecting two intersections.
RoadSegmentView
RoadSegmentView contains methods to draw a road segment on the map.
SeqIter
 
SortIter
 
State
This interface defines the various states and their behaviors for the controller.
StateAddDeliveryRequestToComputedTour
This class represents the state when a delivery requests is being added to a tour that has already been computed at least once.
StateComputeBestTour
This class represents the state when we compute the best tour
StateCourierManagement
This class represents the state for managing the courier.
StateGenerateRoadMap
This class represents the state when we generate a road map
StateInitializeTour
This class represents the state when we assign a delivery request to a tour.
StateLoadCityMap
This class represents the state when the city map is being loaded.
StateLoadDeliveryRequests
This class represents the state when the delivery requests are being loaded.
StateManageDeliveryRequests
This class represents the state for creating delivery requests.
StateRemoveDeliveryRequestToComputedTour
This class represents the state when a delivery request is being removed from a tour that has already been computed at least once.
TemplateTSP
 
TextualView
TextualView represents the textual display panel in the application.
TimeWindowGraph
This class represents a graph with a cost matrix and time constraints on vertices.
Tour
Represents a tour for delivering goods.
TourView
TourView contains methods to draw a list of tours on the map.
TSP
The TSP (Traveling Salesman Problem) interface defines methods for searching for a shortest cost Hamiltonian circuit in a graph within a specified time limit.
TSP1
 
TSP2
 
TSP3
 
Warehouse
Represents a warehouse, a special type of intersection.
Window
The Window class represents the main graphical user interface of the DeliverIF application.
XMLdeserializer
This class provides methods for deserializing XML data to create a city map.
XMLserializer
This class provides methods for serializing delivery requests to XML format.
